action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 grid. The third row from the top has an "X" in the first, second, fourth, and fifth columns, while the third column of that row is empty. All other cells in the grid are empty.

DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5x5. The first row has an X in the first position, followed by four empty squares. The second row has three empty squares, then an X, and one more empty square. The third row has two Xs, then an empty square, and ends with two Xs. The fourth and fifth rows are entirely empty.

QUESTION: Does your grid have an X in the first column of the first row?
